title: Live on Peacock Text
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on their favorited team's page
AND the team is playing in a game that is to be aired/is airing live on Peacock
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the current day's scoreboard at the top of the team page
custom_expected: THEN the user will see "Live on Peacock" text displayed above the Team @ Team text.

title: Peacock Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on their favorited team's page
AND the team is playing in a game that is to be aired/is airing live on Peacock
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the current day's scoreboard at the top of the team page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Peacock button displayed next to Audio (if available) and Preview buttons. 
AND tapping on the Peacock button will launch the Modal

title: Live On Peacock Text
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Scores page
AND a game is to be aired/is airing live on Peacock
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game tile on the scores page that is live on Peacock
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the "Live on Peacock" text at the bottom of the game tile.

title: Watch on Peacock Pill
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Watch tab
AND there is a game to be played that is airing live on Peacock
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game tile for the specific game that is to be aired or is airing on Peacock
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Watch on Peacock pill (Peacock logo) located at the bottom of the game tile
AND it will be black text on a white background.

title: Watch on Peacock Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Watch tab
AND the user is viewing a game tile for a game that is broadcasted on Peacock
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the game tile
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a Watch on Peacock modal displayed
AND the text will state, "This broadcast is available to watch only on Peacock. Open the Peacock app to watch now or download for your streaming device. Archives will be available 90 minutes after the end of the game. Live audio is available on MLB.TV. For more information visit https://mlb.tv/peacock"

title: Tapping on Listen with MLB Audio option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has tapped on the Game tile on the Watch tab for a game that is being broadcasted on Peacock
OR the user has tapped on the Peacock button on the team page for a game that is being broadcasted on Peacock
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the Watch on Peacock modal 
AND the user taps on Listen with MLB Audio
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be sent to the Audio menu for the game (if entitled)
OR the user will be shown a paywall (if not entitled)
